===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|艸|盍|c1=s|t1=grass|c2=p|ls=psc}} — a thatch.

{{zh-l|*盍}} is the original character for the “cover” sense. However, because it was borrowed to mean “why not”, the scope of senses that {{lang|zh|蓋}} covered expanded to include the “cover” sense (and its extended meanings).
